translation:

"how can we still talk about data privacy being important when we give away our name, address, phone number, and even our financial data online every day? ü§î i think we need to focus on how we can effectively protect our personal information instead of just complaining. #dataprivacy #dataprotection"

in this post, i'm expressing my critical view on the current state of data privacy and the fact that many people seem to be careless about sharing their personal information online. i'm suggesting that instead of just complaining about it, we should focus on finding ways to protect our information more effectively.
